TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential sealed beforefieldinit PARAMDESC extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Contains information about how to transfer a structure element, parameter, or function return value between processes.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For additional information about `PARAMDESC`, see the MSDN Library.
The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](../Topic/How%20to:%20Map%20HRESULTs%20and%20Exceptions.md).

Docs.summary: Represents a pointer to a value that is being passed between processes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For additional information about `PARAMDESC`, see the MSDN Library.

Docs.summary: Represents bitmask values that describe the structure element, parameter, or return value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For additional information about `PARAMDESC`, see the MSDN Library.
